baseRuleHeader.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 24

baseRule.text: 若復苾芻尼乞求金銀者。泥薩祇波逸底迦。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 24

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。自為乞金銀。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Nissaggiya Pācittiya 24
